member.name: M:SFA.DAS.VacancyServices.Wage.NationalMinimumWageService.GetHourlyRates(System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets the hourly rates as at a specified date. If no date specified then will return the latest rates.
member.param: The specified date for the rates
member.returns: The rates as at the specified date or the latest rates if no date specified

member.name: M:SFA.DAS.VacancyServices.Wage.NationalMinimumWageService.GetWeeklyRates(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Decimal)
member.summary: Gets the weekly rates as at a specified date and hours per week. If no date specified then will return the latest rates. If no hours specified then will use 37.5 hours as a standard week.
member.param: The specified date for the rates
member.returns: The rates as at the specified date or the latest rates if no date specified

member.name: M:SFA.DAS.VacancyServices.Wage.NationalMinimumWageService.GetAnnualRates(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Decimal)
member.summary: Gets the annual rates as at a specified date and hours per week. If no date specified then will return the latest rates. If no hours specified then will use 37.5 hours as a standard week.
member.param: The specified date for the rates
member.returns: The rates as at the specified date or the latest rates if no date specified
